overview_of_class: PURPOSE - To review fundamental aspects of clinical research, including: evaluation of published clinical research; development of new research questions and methodology appropriate to those questions; and techniques for data analysis and dissemination
name: Research in Clinical  Audiology
title: SoC CSD 508-0-20 Research in Clinical  Audiology

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: PURPOSE - To review fundamental aspects of clinical research, including: evaluation of published clinical research; development of new research questions and methodology appropriate to those questions; and techniques for data analysis and dissemination

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value: PREREQUISITES - Introductory clinical audiology, rehabilitative audiology, and familiarity with basic statistical analysis

descriptions.name: Learning Objectives
descriptions.value:
1. To understand and evaluate published research
2. To develop a research question and study methodology
3. To demonstrate ethical research conduct
4. To gain knowledge of basic statistical analysis
5. To communicate ideas and results in writing

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value: TEXT: Valente, M., et al. (2011). The Audiology Capstone: Research, Presentation, and Publication. New York: Thieme.

subject: CSD
